name: Dark Hacker News
description:
EDIT: I won't update this CSS here on userstyles.org any more after the Stylish incident. You'll find this theme in OpenUserCSS if you want.

I used ooni's[1] Hacker News userstyles posted here[2] and made a dark version using Chris Kempson's[3] Atelier Savanna color scheme.
